name: gpmd/mediasymlinkfix
description: Fixes an issue in Magento CE 1.8.1.0 and EE 1.13.1.0 where using a symlinked media directory breaks CMS upload functionality in the admin. Must be enabled in the Admin under System > Config > Advanced > Developer. See: http://www.magentocommerce.com/bug-tracking/issue?issue=16088 http://stackoverflow.com/a/21547351/763468 http://magento.stackexchange.com/a/14821/2190

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
